pullRequest.title: Drop writing min/max statistics for TIMESTAMP columns for Hive tables

nodes.bodyText: This comment was vestigial, there is no longer such a thing "legacy" and "non-legacy" timestamp.
in a sense, this was valid, right? and OK to keep?
lets create a follow up issue and keep a TODO here, so it's easier to impl later

commit.message: Drop writing min/max statistics for TIMESTAMP columns for Hive tables

afterCommit.message: Drop writing min/max statistics for TIMESTAMP columns for Hive tables
